objects.text:
• Classic retro-styled design
• Exceptional image quality
• Intuitive manual controls
• Lightweight travel companion

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system compatibility
• Precision-engineered manual control dials for intuitive operation
• High-performance autofocus system for quick and accurate focusing
• Built-in electronic viewfinder for precise composition
• Durable metal construction with ergonomic grip
• WiFi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens collection
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Advanced shooting modes and creative filters

banner_details:
This promotional banner has a modern and bold visual composition, structured around a sleek dark-themed background with subtle geometric patterns and diagonal lines, all centered to highlight a featured product. The top section includes a large, bold title (id: "heading") using a condensed sans-serif font in white, immediately drawing attention. Positioned right below is a striking red subheading (id: "subheading") for emphasis. A feature list (id: "description") is neatly aligned on the left half in muted grey tone, enhancing readability without overpowering. The price (id: "price") is prominently displayed in large white digits with the currency symbol on a dark backdrop. Below it, a red call-to-action button (id: "cta_background" with "cta") labeled “SHOP NOW” creates urgency. A detailed image of the product (id: "product_image") on the right is cleanly placed and slightly tilted for a dynamic look. 

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Gray: `#1A1A1A`
- Mid Gray: `#333333`, `#252525`
- Light Gray: `#B3B3B3`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Red Accent: `#D32026`
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, showcased in a predominantly matte black finish with metallic and chrome accents. The primary color is deep black (#1C1C1C), which gives the product a sleek, professional aesthetic. Glossy elements on the lens and dials reflect ambient light, adding highlights of charcoal gray (#3A3A3A) and steel silver (#C0C0C0). Subtle white (#FFFFFF) is used for branding and dial markings, contrasting sharply for visual clarity. Hints of vibrant red (#FF3D3D) and amber-orange (#F5A623) on lens indicators subtly draw attention to functionality. This monochromatic yet contrasted palette makes a compelling base for a modern, tech-inspired advertisement banner.
